name: Wigwam Peak to Pub Gift Box - Men's
description: A 3-pack of lightweight and colourful socks. Wool and synthetic blend yarns keep your feet dry and comfortable.Made of stretch nylon, merino wool, Ultimax®, Tencel and spandex. Fabric content varies by sock.Light cushioning in heel and toe keeps you comfortable without feeling bulky.Elastic arch to hold sock in place.Seamless toe closure.
